body: I decided not to post an AMA because I'm too hot for that. SO I decided to just let y'all reply with ANYTHING because it's the last day of the hottest thing ever (not true, Chelsea is the hottest). But anyways, RIP Avicus. You were hot. k bye.

title: Not An AMA because Im not a basic beach
